main.name: Nordic-Giant Project
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use react and vue.js to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Desarrollo Frontend de sitios y aplicaciones web utilizando tecnologías como HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, SASS, consumo de APIs, Git. Ademas de herramientas como Trello, Postman, GitHub.

work.title: Fullstack Developer
work.description: Parte de un equipo de desarrollo en el que utilizamos la metodología Scrum para la gestión del proyecto y el stack MERN como tecnologías, los frameworks Material-UI, y Express.js. Además de herramientas como Monday, Slack, Git/GitHub.
